closed_reason: Verified tk board functionality: (1) server starts on default port 3000 with HTTP 200 response, (2) --port flag works correctly (tested on 8081), (3) cloud sync connects successfully to tickboard.dev, (4) migrated findTickDir tests to cmd/tk/cmd/board_test.go with all 3 tests passing. Integration is complete with main.go routing and ResetFlags already in place.
description: Run tk board and verify: server starts on correct port, web UI loads, SSE events work, cloud sync works (if configured). Run existing tickboard tests against tk board.
title: Verify tk board functionality
